meanings.definition: A polysaccharide that is a major component of plant cell walls.
meanings.sent1: Hemicellulose provides structural support to plant cell walls.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the role of hemicellulose in plant cell walls.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used hemicellulose from the tree to build a tiny fort.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as hemicellulose holding together plant cells.
meanings.sent5: The hemicellulose fibers in the wall made it tough like a fortress.

meanings.definition: A complex carbohydrate found in the cell walls of plants.
meanings.sent1: The nutritionist explained the benefits of hemicellulose in plant cell walls.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use fertilizers to enhance the growth of hemicellulose in plant cell walls.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that hemicellulose must be the secret ingredient in plant walls.
meanings.sent4: Her words were woven together with the strength of hemicellulose in plant cell walls.
meanings.sent5: The hemicellulose content in the wall was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
